apps.name: Youtube (YTLitePlus)
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.versionDescription:
Current YouTube IPA: "18.48.3"  
Current YTLitePlus Version: "2.4"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.48.3•2.4: (2023•12•05)

• Updated Youtube from "18.46.3" to "18.48.3"
• Updated submodules
• New "Hide Shorts" option (YTUnShorts) from @poomsmart
  
Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v16.05.7•v17.38.10)*
• VersionSpoofer (Lite) doesn't work with YTLite *(as the version is already spoofed by YTLite to fix YTClassicVideoQuality)*
• Age•restricted videos don't load correctly 29 *(enable "Skip content warning" in YTlite settings to resolve this issue)*
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features! 

Supercharge your YouTube experience with +15 tweaks: 

• YTLite: Ad-blocking & background playback, +50 options
• iSponsorBlock: Skip sponsor ads
• YouPiP: Native PiP mode
• YTUHD: 2K & 4K video quality
• YouTube Dislike Return: Reinstate dislike counts
• YTClassicVideoQuality: Old video quality selector
• YTNoHoverCards: Disable suggested videos
• YTABGoodies: Disable A/B testing features
• NOYTPremium: Remove Premium upsell alerts
• YTSpeed: Add 2.25x to 4x playback speeds
• YTMiniplayerEnabler: Enable Miniplayer
• DontEatMyContent: Prevent notch issues
• YTShortsProgress: Enable Shorts progress bar
• YTABConfig: Control A/B testing flags
• YouMute: Mute/unmute videos
• LowContrastMode: Reduce interface contrast
• And many more...

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.

apps.name: Apollo for Reddit
apps.subtitle: The award-winning Reddit app
apps.versionDescription:
Apollo for Reddit (with ImprovedCustomApi) Release Information

Apollo .IPA Version: "1.15.11"  
ImprovedCustomApi .DEB Version: "1.0.8" 

RELEASE 1.15.11•1.0.8: (2023•12•16)
• Updated ImprovedCustomApi from "1.0.7" to "1.0.8" 
   • Lower minimum iOS version requirement to 14.0
   • Toggleable settings for blocking announcements and some Ultra settings (not fully working, see https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/1). These are the same as the previous experimental builds.
        • All toggles are located in Settings •> General •> Custom API
        • New Comments Highlightifier shows new comment count badge, but doesn't highlight comments inside a thread
        • Subreddit Weather and Time widget doesn't seem to work (not showing or loads infinitely)
 
Known issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
  • Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser
apps.localizedDescription:
Apollo is an app for Reddit built for customizability, smoothness, gestures, and taking advantage of everything iOS has to offer. Apollo is a beautiful Reddit app built for fast navigation with an incredibly powerful set of features. Thanks to features like the Jump Bar, fully customizable gestures, and a super-charged Media Viewer, browsing Reddit has never been this amazing. It's created specifically with iOS design guidelines in mind, so it fits right at home on your device, and with input from thousands of Redditors helping sculpt and perfect it over several years before launching: 

- Jump Bar, for super-fast hopping between subreddits
- Super-charged Media Viewer for an amazing experience viewing images, GIFs, videos, albums, and more from a variety of sources.
- Tabbed interface for easy navigating
- Incredibly powerful Markdown composer for writing comments and posts
- Full inline Imgur uploading, both images and albums
- Large or compact posts depending on your preference
- Dark mode (can be automatic)
- Fully customizable gestures
- Safari View Controller for browsing articles and links
- Inline previews of media in comments
- 3D Touch support
- Beautifully organized Inbox
- Filtering and blocking
- Face ID / Touch ID / Passcode lock
- Moderator features
- Tons of settings to tweak
- GIF scrubbing to go backward and forward in time
- Multiple accounts
- Powerful search
- Full Markdown rendering
- Unobtrusive Volume Indicator

As well as much, much more and it's constantly evolving. If you have anything you'd specifically like to see, come to the ApolloApp subreddit and we'd love to hear it! Apollo is an unofficial app, and side effects may include an incredible browsing experience.

versions.localizedDescription:
Apollo .IPA Version: "1.15.11"  
ImprovedCustomApi .DEB Version: "1.0.8" 

RELEASE 1.15.11•1.0.8: (2023•12•16)
• Updated ImprovedCustomApi from "1.0.7" to "1.0.8" 
   • Lower minimum iOS version requirement to 14.0
   • Toggleable settings for blocking announcements and some Ultra settings (not fully working, see https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/1). These are the same as the previous experimental builds.
        • All toggles are located in Settings •> General •> Custom API
        • New Comments Highlightifier shows new comment count badge, but doesn't highlight comments inside a thread
        • Subreddit Weather and Time widget doesn't seem to work (not showing or loads infinitely)
 
Known issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
  • Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

• Added: ApolloSideloadFix
This allows sideloaded apps to save the login state when exiting.
Credit @level3tjg
• Added: How to Use

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: App needs location when in use.

apps.name: Winston for Reddit
apps.subtitle: Winston, a beautiful and native Reddit client for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Just a small fix that's already included in the TestFlight version of the app
apps.localizedDescription:
Introducing Winston: 
 A Stunning and native Reddit client for iOS
- In-development, free, and open-source app and bot 
- User-friendly interface designed for easy navigation
- Compliance with Reddit's Terms of Service for a seamless experience
- Stay connected with the Reddit community in a sleek and intuitive way
- Experience the beauty of Winston, your ultimate iOS Reddit companion.

versions.localizedDescription: Just a small fix that's already included in the TestFlight version of the app

• Huge performance upgrade!
• Implemented saved posts. You can now access the "Saved" tab in your subs drawer.
• Add controversial sort
• Add subscribed indicator / button to search
• Added option to use inline post toolbar in place of floating toolbar in the post page. (Theme •> Post page •> Inline upvote toolbar • at bottom)
• Added ability to sort by only posts or only comments in a user profile. (Click the corresponding karma button)
• Tweaked look of UI in many areas (mainly compact mode improvements).
• Images in comments now open in the app.
• In•app safari support improved.
• Implemented iCloud syncing for credentials.
• Removed deprecated bug reporting functionality.
• Enhanced stability for the video player and made minor performance tweaks.
• Deployed fix for user flairs and new comment indicators.
• Various bug fixes, stability improvements and QOL tweaks.

Added
• Live Text in images
• Whats new Sheet
• Lock the app with Face ID / Fingerprint ID
• Theme Store
• Subscribed indicator / button when searching for subs
• Add settings import / export
• Add line spacing option for themes
• New comments indicator
• Added flairs in comments
Fixed
• "Streamable" videos now working
• Blur nsfw subs when searching for subs
• Default search sort in settings
• Save sort per subreddit
• Save comment search per port
• Support for themable user flairs
• Add theming for load more button
• fix wrong username showing up for comments

Special thanks to rbertus2000, mmynk, Nelson Dane, Zander Bobronnikov and ben•wheeler for contributing to this release!

• Fixed crash when replying
• Fixed crash when importing new themes
• Fixed crash when long pressing on comment
• Fixed random name in exported themes
• Now exported themes have ".winston" extension (zip will continue to work though)
• Sharing zip to winston is now allowed
• ".winston" open in one tap into winston and imports it

This version is the first IPA available for download for people who can't use TestFlight for any reason.
We don't have a versioning system yet as well, so "0.1" is not exactly precise.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your library to be able to download images.

privacy.name: DocumentsFolder
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your documents to save/import themes.
